title: $225+ O/W Caribbean, Latin America Sale with Delta
text:
Home > Flight Deals > $225+ O/W Caribbean, Latin America Sale with Delta $225+ O/W Caribbean, Latin America Sale with Delta August 4, 2015 7:13pm by Patricia Magaña , SmarterTravel Staff Tweet 
Delta's Latin America and Caribbean has sale fares to many international destinations, including to just south of the border and many more further afield like South America. Find discounted flights to Leon and Monterrey; as well as to Santo Domingo, Cartagena, and Panama City. 
Featured travel is during September 29 - February 28 (dependent on the preferred route), but tickets must be booked by August 10. See the sale provider for destination-specific blackout dates and other travel restriction ... more 
Delta's Latin America and Caribbean has sale fares to many international destinations, including to just south of the border and many more further afield like South America. Find discounted flights to Leon and Monterrey; as well as to Santo Domingo, Cartagena, and Panama City. 
Featured travel is during September 29 - February 28 (dependent on the preferred route), but tickets must be booked by August 10. See the sale provider for destination-specific blackout dates and other travel restrictions. Flights start at $449 round-trip (or $224.50 one-way, rounded up to $225 round-trip). EDITOR'S OVERVIEW Where to Book: We found the best prices for the travel window of these sales by using a flexible date search, which can be accessed through our flight comparison tool to the right. You can find this promotion on the airline's sale page . Pros:
